section.title: Description
section.para: The <rich:page> component is used to create basic (X)HTML markup and define document parameters like DOCTYPE, title etc. The component also allows to build top level layout: header, bottom, center and left or right layout areas.

listitem.para: Option to change the renderer of the component (themes support)
Possibility to define parameters of an HTML page
Possibility to create page layout with facets
Provides styling based on RichFaces skinnability
